title: MD
biography: Anuradha Bhat is an Indian playback singer who predominantly works in Kannada language films. She has sung over 100 songs for feature films and also sung in various private musical albums.
aiSummary: Nirmala Bhat is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 4 at Breast oncology (Member). Has been published in Nature, The Lancet. Infectious diseases, Nature communications. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
